articles.content: The Los Angeles Dodgers were the best team in the majors all season. No one scored more runs or had a higher team on-base-plus-slugging percentage. No one allowed fewer earned runs. They were dominan… [+5803 chars]

articles.title: Phillies: Limited number of NLCS tickets at Citizens Bank Park sell out - WPVI-TV
articles.description: A limited number of tickets for NLCS games at Citizens Bank Park went on sale Monday morning. They sold out Monday morning.
articles.content:
PHILADELPHIA (WPVI) -- A limited number of tickets for NLCS games at Citizens Bank Park went on sale Monday morning. They sold out Monday morning.
